title: Is RBI Issuing New Rs 1,000 Notes? No, Image Was Made by an Artist
subtitle: Fact Check of RBI Issues Rs 1000 Notes: We saw some text on the top right,  saying ‘Artistic imagination,’ which clearly shows that there is nothing official about this note and has just been created out of an artist’s imagination.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral message on social media claims that the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has released new Rs 1,000 currency notes. The alleged new note has an impression of Mahatma Gandhi and a green strip on the right, among other signatures.

Several social media users shared the image on Facebook and Twitter with the same claim.
